name: Little Devils - Demo
description:
** CONTROLLER FRIENDLY ** 

~20 minutes of gameplay

Steam page will hopefully be ready to go soon! Sorry for any confusion.

-----

After centuries of being misjudged, out hero agrees to descend into hell to rescue his ancestors. 

This platformer game will eventually contain ~200 screens worth of challenges as we travel across the 9 circles of hell with our valiant devil.

This is a small slice of what will be a much larger game. All opinions are appreciated. 

:)
